attributes.action: To stop Tesco using their financial power to persuade Inverness council into reversing their decision to refuse Tesco  permission for a fourth supermarket in  the Inverness area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tesco in Inverness have been refused permission to build a fourth supermarket in this area.   They are threatening to appeal.  This appeal process  will wipe out all council funds which will in turn affect the services they offer to the community. Inverness already has three large Tesco Supermarkets and a fourth would have a devastating impact on the life of small busineses in this town.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
